pages.text: Bull Terriers were originally bred for dog fighting and vermin control, though were also used in now-illegal bull-baiting.$(br2)Standing at just under a block tall, these stocky dogs come in five different coats.
Bull Terriers are found most commonly in old growth taigas and dark forests. You can also find them in savannas and, more rarely, old growth birch forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef or Chicken Treat.
